actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1153.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 98 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park in the States of Alaska and Washington.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1153) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park in the States of Alaska and Washington. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of the Act, not to exceed $2,655,000 for land acquisition, and not more than $5,885,000 for development.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park in the States of Alaska and Washington.
